professional_summary: Accomplished Solution Architect and Engineering Leader with 30+ years of experience spanning business intelligence, cloud architecture, and software development. Proven track record of delivering complex technical solutions across financial services, healthcare, and technology sectors. Expert in stakeholder management, agile delivery, and building high-performing teams. Particularly skilled in SQL Server, Azure cloud technologies, and business intelligence solutions with deep expertise in lean architecture and solution delivery.

work_experience.description: Rebuilt personal blog using modern web technologies, owning both code and content. Transitioned from managed WordPress to custom solution for better code highlighting and control.
achievements: Created custom blog platform using modern web stack
Migrated 20 years of blogging content
Implemented advanced code highlighting capabilities

work_experience.description: Solution Architect for Modern Application Transformation team, leading presales through delivery. Delivered award-winning projects including OfWat Water Innovation Challenge winner and NHS DevOps Excellence initiatives.
achievements: Won OfWat Water Innovation Challenge for vulnerable customer data sharing hub
Delivered DevOps Excellence roadmap for NHS organization
Led IFRS-17 analytics transformation for UK insurer
Architected Python-to-Azure migration for Oil & Gas company
Transitioned microservices to managed support model for financial services

work_experience.description: Practice role accountable for development standards, skills management, learning & development, and team capabilities.
achievements: Established development standards across practice
Implemented skills management framework
Led learning and development initiatives

work_experience.description: Data and Integration Architect for Healthcare Patient Flow and Optimization project. Designed low-latency kappa architecture for patient flow monitoring and control.
achievements: Designed low-latency patient flow monitoring solution
Implemented HL7 event processor with Azure Functions
Integrated ML models for length-of-stay predictions
Featured in WIRED article: 'The digital tools that could save the NHS'

achievements: Reduced monthly Azure OpEx costs by 50%

achievements: Reduced lead times from 50+ days to 10 days

Implemented JSON configuration solution for SSIS

achievements: Delivered complex multi-source BI solution for fixed income trading
Implemented big data/Hadoop cluster integration
Led data quality enterprise rollout
Reduced time-to-market through lean process analysis
Managed team of 8-10 developers using Scrum methodology

achievements: Delivered FX trading BI solution for BNP Paribas
Implemented batch payment processing with Integration Services for Nationwide

work_experience.description: Worked with diverse customers from ISVs to enterprises on full development lifecycle. Specialized in .NET, development processes, and business intelligence.
achievements: Delivered BI architecture and performance solutions for Aggreko

Implemented BI solutions for Barclays Capital and Xchanging

achievements: Architected and deployed sit-up.tv auction system
Created SQL/OLAP installer tool reducing upgrade costs
Designed XML processing pipeline for telecoms integration
Delivered web-based call centre BI system to major UK telcos

Built journalist workstation in partnership with Oracle
